attributes.action: Ground all flights in and out of the country to stop the spread of Corona.
attributes.additional_details: Live Flight radar apps still show massive activities in the skies. However over Italy there is significantly less activity in their airspace. They have reported fewer cases recently and this seems to correlate with air traffic. This may help in turning the tide on Corona and save lives.
attributes.background: Total ban on travel across countries for the foreseeable to reduce the risk of Corona Virus spreading globally.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
